data.name: The Pioneers: surviving desolation
data.detailed_description:
Planet Earth. 2084. It is time to put your mark on History. You are in charge of Io-1, the first inhabited space mission to Io, the harsh innermost moon of Jupiter. Extreme temperatures, intense volcanic and seismic activity, magnetic storms… Retrieve your space station and face the most hostile environment of the solar system. Do not worry, your crew is well prepared. Everything’s gonna be ok…

The Pioneers: surviving desolation is an innovative space simulation game where you play as a crew of specialists that must survive and explore the secrets of the desolated moon, Io.




Start with 3 different characters randomly selected among a pool of 15. You will have to adapt to their strengths and weaknesses. Each game offers you a unique challenge.




Use your ship wreck wisely, and quickly develop your own ways to produce materials and food inside your station. Build modules and engineering systems, craft wearable equipment and get all you need to survive.




Volcanos, seismic activity and magnetic storms will put pressure on your crew. Do not forget to monitor your beacons and avoid dying because of a sulfur wind. Your life depends of your anticipating and adapting capabilities.




Mission first. Board a rover or a flying drone to gather precious resources that surround the station. Explore beautiful desolate landscapes and collect scientific data to accomplish your mission.

and More...


-Upgrades, upgrades and upgrades!
-Advanced health system.
-Multiple winning conditions and endings
-Io biomes
-Scientific elements

data.short_description: Are you brave enough to survive ? The Pioneers offers a deep and innovative space survival experience. Build your space station, manage your crew and explore the harsh environment of Io, the innermost moon of Jupiter.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 4th generation / AMD FX-8300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 / AMD RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 6th generation (or better) / AMD Ryzen 5 1600 (or better)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 (or better) / AMD RX 580 (or better)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.12 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 2.7Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon460 4GB or Intel(R) Iris(TM) Plus Graphics
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
